means: 骗取（某物），哄骗（某人干某事）

sentence.Network_en: He managed to wheedle his way into the offices.
sentence.Network_cn: 他连哄带骗地设法进了办公楼。

sentence.Network_en: Cross decided to beg and wheedle a bit.
sentence.Network_cn: 克罗斯决定用上点乞求和哄骗。

sentence.Network_en: The kids can always wheedle money out of their father.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们总是能从父亲那里哄出钱来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... indulgent adj. 纵容的 28。 wheedle vt. 诱骗, 哄骗, 骗得 29。 abstemious adj. 有节制的, 节约的 30。.
TOEFL词汇表（Part 59）_英语听力下载_沪江英语 ... wand n. 棒, 棍; 魔杖 wheedle v. (用花言巧语) 哄骗；骗取 whir v. 呼呼急转.

list.abs: 甘言蜜语 in... ... 匙叶甘松 spikenard 甜言密语 cheating wheedling;dishonest rhetoric; 心甘 to be willing;to be satisfied.
They finally wheedled the secret out of him ., 他们最终骗他说出了秘密.
She wheedled him into buying her a mink coat ., 她用甜言蜜语诱他买貂皮大衣给她.
The boy wheedled money out of his father ., 那男孩哄骗他父亲的钱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: perhaps from German wedeln 'cringe, fawn', from Wedel 'tail, fan'

entry.def: If you say that someone wheedles, you mean that they try to persuade someone to do or give them what they want, for example by saying nice things that they do not mean.

example.ex: Cross decided to beg and wheedle a bit...
example.tran: 克罗斯决定用上点乞求和哄骗。

example.ex: He managed to wheedle his way into the offices.
example.tran: 他连哄带骗地设法进了办公楼。

means.word_mean: 1. influence or urge by gentle urging, caressing, or flattering;

auth_sentence.content: He had to pacify her and wheedle her into a better humour.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had to pacify her and wheedle her into a better humour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had to pacify her and wheedle her into a better humour.

auth_sentence.content: Kiran and I had gone to wheedle him into taking us to the cinema.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kiran and I had gone to wheedle him into taking us to the cinema.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kiran and I had gone to wheedle him into taking us to the cinema.

means.word_mean: 骗取(某物), 哄骗(某人干某事)

sentences.en: They have wheedled a holiday from the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 他们哄骗校长而获得了假日。

sentences.en: The children wheedled me into letting them go to the film.
sentences.cn: 孩子们把我哄得同意让他们去看电影了。
